00029 // project header files
00030 #include "fft.h"
00031 
00036 void
00037 Fft::bitreverse(real x[], int N )
00038 {
00039   real rtemp, itemp ;
00040   int i, j, m ;
00041   for ( i = j = 0 ; i < N ; i += 2, j += m ) {
00042     if ( j > i ) {
00043       rtemp = x[j] ; itemp = x[j+1] ; /* complex exchange */
00044       x[j] = x[i] ; x[j+1] = x[i+1] ;
00045       x[i] = rtemp ; x[i+1] = itemp ;
00046     }
00047     for ( m = N>>1 ; m >= 2 && j >= m ; m >>= 1 )
00048       j -= m ;
00049   }
00050 }
00051 
00060 void
00061 Fft::rfft( real x[], int  N, int forward )
00062 {
00063   real c1, c2, h1r, h1i, h2r, h2i, wr, wi, wpr, wpi, temp, theta ;
00064   real xr, xi ;
00065   int i, i1, i2, i3, i4, N2p1 ;
00066   theta = PI/N ;
00067   wr = 1. ;
00068   wi = 0. ;
00069   c1 = 0.5 ;
00070     if ( forward ) {
00071       c2 = -0.5 ;
00072       cfft( x, N, forward ) ;
00073       xr = x[0] ;
00074       xi = x[1] ;
00075     } 
00076     else 
00077       {
00078         c2 = 0.5 ;
00079         theta = -theta ;
00080         xr = x[1] ;
00081         xi = 0. ;
00082         x[1] = 0. ;
00083       }
00084     wpr = (real)(-2.*pow( sin( 0.5*theta ), 2. ));
00085     wpi = sin( theta ) ;
00086     N2p1 = (N<<1) + 1 ;
00087     for ( i = 0 ; i <= N>>1 ; i++ ) 
00088       {
00089         i1 = i<<1 ;
00090         i2 = i1 + 1 ;
00091         i3 = N2p1 - i2 ;
00092         i4 = i3 + 1 ;
00093         if ( i == 0 ) {
00094           h1r =  c1*(x[i1] + xr ) ;
00095           h1i =  c1*(x[i2] - xi ) ;
00096           h2r = -c2*(x[i2] + xi ) ;
00097           h2i =  c2*(x[i1] - xr ) ;
00098           x[i1] =  h1r + wr*h2r - wi*h2i ;
00099           x[i2] =  h1i + wr*h2i + wi*h2r ;
00100           xr =  h1r - wr*h2r + wi*h2i ;
00101           xi = -h1i + wr*h2i + wi*h2r ;
00102         } 
00103         else {
00104           h1r =  c1*(x[i1] + x[i3] ) ;
00105           h1i =  c1*(x[i2] - x[i4] ) ;
00106           h2r = -c2*(x[i2] + x[i4] ) ;
00107           h2i =  c2*(x[i1] - x[i3] ) ;
00108           x[i1] =  h1r + wr*h2r - wi*h2i ;
00109           x[i2] =  h1i + wr*h2i + wi*h2r ;
00110           x[i3] =  h1r - wr*h2r + wi*h2i ;
00111           x[i4] = -h1i + wr*h2i + wi*h2r ;
00112         }
00113         wr = (temp = wr)*wpr - wi*wpi + wr ;
00114         wi = wi*wpr + temp*wpi + wi ;
00115       }
00116     if ( forward )
00117       x[1] = xr ;
00118     else
00119       cfft( x, N, forward ) ;
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00132 void
00133 Fft::cfft(real x[], int NC, int forward )
00134 {
00135   real wr, wi, wpr, wpi, theta, scale ;
00136   int mmax, ND, m, i, j, delta ;
00137   ND = NC<<1 ;
00138   bitreverse( x, ND ) ;
00139   for ( mmax = 2 ; mmax < ND ; mmax = delta ) {
00140     delta = mmax<<1 ;
00141     theta = TWOPI/( forward? mmax : -mmax ) ;
00142     wpr = (real)(-2.*pow( sin( 0.5*theta ), 2. ));
00143     wpi = sin( theta ) ;
00144     wr = 1. ;
00145     wi = 0. ;
00146     for ( m = 0 ; m < mmax ; m += 2 ) {
00147       register real rtemp, itemp ;
00148             for ( i = m ; i < ND ; i += delta ) 
00149               {
00150                 j = i + mmax ;
00151                 rtemp = wr*x[j] - wi*x[j+1] ;
00152                 itemp = wr*x[j+1] + wi*x[j] ;
00153                 x[j] = x[i] - rtemp ;
00154                 x[j+1] = x[i+1] - itemp ;
00155                 x[i] += rtemp ;
00156                 x[i+1] += itemp ;
00157               }
00158             wr = (rtemp = wr)*wpr - wi*wpi + wr ;
00159             wi = wi*wpr + rtemp*wpi + wi ;
00160     }
00161   }
00162   /*
00163    * scale output
00164    */
00165   scale = forward ? (real)1.0/ND : (real)2.0 ;
00166   { register real *xi=x, *xe=x+ND ;
00167   while ( xi < xe )
00168     *xi++ *= scale ;
00169   }
00170 
00171 }
